title: Week 2 fantasy football RB rankings: Gurley vs. Kamara
text:
This is the matchup dreams are made of. Two elite running backs on opposite sides of the field. Two top fantasy picks going at it ... well, actually — one top fantasy pick going at it against a former top fantasy pick.

[Week 2 Fantasy Rankings: QBs | RBs | WRs | TEs | FLEX | DST | Kickers]

Todd Gurley’s knee, along with questions about his usage, has removed some of his luster, but he still put up great numbers in Week 1. Alvin Kamara did his usual Kamara things on Monday night against the Texans. Who will come out as the better man in Week 2?

2019 Fantasy Football Rankings powered by FantasyPros ECR ™ - Expert Consensus Rankings
description: Alvin Kamara vs. Todd Gurley — who are you taking? Our experts reveal their fantasy football rankings for the RB position in time for Week 2.
